ABOUT US
ABOUT EVETAR
Founded in Sept. 2002, Xiamen Leading Optics Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise certified by Nation and technology center certified by Xiamen government. The company’s is headquartered in Xiamen, the beautiful oceanfront garden city, with global marketing presence in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Frankfurt, Taiwan and Korea.
With 2 active plants and 1 new plant in planning, Xiamen Leading Optics is capable to supply optic products in large quantity with stable quality. As our main base of operation, Xiamen Leading Optics Xiamen plant owns 33,000㎡of industrial land with more than 1000 employees, and is equipped with full optical product development and manufacture capability, from concept design and product development to mass production and quality inspection. Over the years by creating the “one-stop-service” experience to our customers, we have proved our value as a professional optical solution provider.
In addition to Xiamen Headquarter, we also have Shangrao Plant as our main base glass material supply and processing. With more than 22000㎡ of active production area, Shangrao plant has ensured Xiamen Headquarter with abundant and steady supply of high quality glass lens elements to be used in lens product assembly.
Furthermore, as company’s new base of future growth, we have started the construction of 2 new plants, one with 40,000 square meters of production area in Xiamen Haicang south area and the other with more than 200,000 square meters of production area in Zhangzhou. Together with our current production capability, we aim to not only in today but also in the coming future to be the reliable partner of optical solutions and products.
Besides to our reliable production capability, Xiamen Leading Optics highly values technology growth and innovations. Our Xiamen headquarter is equipped with world-leading R&D center with professional and specialized equipment for advanced optical design, development, test and measurement, Over the years, we have successfully developed over 1500 optical solutions, and 67 different patented technologies across multiple fields of application including security surveillance, medical and biological studies and researches, intelligent traffic systems, video conference, intelligent home security, sports camera and many more for our customer over the world.
Not only do we value technology growth in product design and development, but we also integrate technology in our production to ensure best and stable quality in our products during mass production. Certified with ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18001 and IATF16949 quality and management standards, our factory with fully integrated advanced autonomous technology for both assembly process and inspection, has provided most reliable product quality assurance from a systematic level to our product users globally.
With our vision “To become respectable global leading Optical solution provider” Xiamen Leading Optics will always commit to quality and innovation, and to create best values to our customers in the global market.
1.Top 100 Chinese Security Enterprises
2.Prospective Technology Leading
Enterprise of Fujian Province
We also got the certifications of ISO9001 quality control system,
ISO14001 environment management system,
OHSAS18001 professional health safety control system
and IATF16949 quality management system
Company culture
Vision
To be one of the best globally optical solution providers
Mission
Continuous innovation, to offer customers optimal products, services and lens solutions,to estabkish the Evetar's value and create the Leading International brand image in the process of value for customers;
Build a platform for employees to realize their values and dreams;realize for shareholders' investment value;realize the common development of individuals and enterprises,and promote social prosperity.
Core values
Respect
Customer
Respect customers' requests and concern that our products and services dissatisfy customers
Continuousinnovation
Continuous innovation in product, service, management to pursue excellence
Teamwork
Cooperation, contribution, competition and enterprising spirit
Honesty
and gratitude
Enterprises treat their employees like families and employees are loyal to enterprises; we always keep promises to our customers and suppliers, and always facing colleagues, subordinates, suppliers and customers with deep gratitude.
Strive for excellence in extremely
Not better, but best.
Never saygive up
Never give up encounter any difficulties.
MILESTONE
2022
1.Established Infrared Optical BU in 2022, invested more than 20 millions on precisiou production and test facilities for thermal optics
2021
1.EstablishedHaicangsouth area factory, increase capital to expand production bases for vehicle and consumer optical lens.
2020
1.IPO approved
2.Xiamen Leading Automotive Optech Co., Ltd.
2019
1.Hybird lens production line/1000 class clean room set up
2018
1.Established industrial manufacturing base on the south part of Haicang, Xiamen
2.Established subsidiary in Shangrao, Jiangxi to expand the manufacturing base for spherical lens process
3.Completed the shareholding system reform.
2017
1.Acquired near 33 acre land as future long-term manufacturing base in Zhangzhou.
2.Established Evetar sales branch office in San Francisco.
3.Started to plan IPO.
2015
1.Introduced fully integrated automated assembly line.
2011
1.Acquired certification of ISO9001-2008、TS16949-2009、ISO14001-2004、OHSAS18001-2007、IATF16949-2016.
2010
1.Invested in aspherical Tech field and set up subsidiary: Xiamen Freeform Optical Technology Co., Ltd.
2007
1.Moved into headquarters in Haicang industry district, Xiamen.
2005
1.Acquired land and built new plant in Haicang industry district, Xiamen.
2.Established Evetar sales branch office in LA, USA and Shenzhen.
2002
1.founded in 5 floor, Hongye Building, Xiamen Returnees' Start-up Business Building.

Events Latest Update
Xiamen International Optics Fair 2024 Xiamen will be on 2024-11-21
Xiamen International Optics Fair next edition date updated
Time: 2023/11/23 - 25. Venue: Xiamen Exhibition and Conference Center. Website: http://www.xmiof.cn. Highlights of Xiamen Optics Fair. Brand gathering and trade together. Investors matching with buyers. Refreshing brand and revealing Intelligence about China. New opportunities, multiple activities.
China's economic growth has been positive in recent years. Glasses and parts exports are increasing year after year. Xiamen is adjacent to Taiwan and has expanded the glasses manufacturing industry. It has established a form that includes sunglasses, frames, optical lens, instruments, and equipment.
China Xiamen International Optics Fair, also known as Xiamen Optics Fair, will be held in Xiamen International Conference & Exhibition Center on November 24 - 26, 2022. This is due to the large market for glasses in the world and the wide prospects of development in the industry. The scale of the exhibition is more than 50000 sqm, with 1500 booths set up to international standards. Xiamen Optics Fair aims to "boost Chinese brand and develop industry" by gathering industry leaders, entire industry products, focusing on cutting-edge information, grasping direction of wind, radiation, global market.
Add:Xiamen International Conference & Exhibition Center.
Organizer: Xiamen Optometric & Optical Association Xiamen Conference & Exhibition Group Inc.
Holding company of Xiamen C&D Corporation Limited.
